title: Looking for duo/flex
body:
Hi there,
First of all, i am B2 now. (b2-b1)
Failed to promote to S5 3 tiems now.

i'd like to duo or party with someone to climb ranked games.
I get afk players/troll almost half of games i play.
I will be very happy if there's a person i can trust. JUST A PERSON!!!! in my team. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

My positions are ADC/SUPP.
We can practice normal mode several games first, if you want.

I don't want a person who is toxic, chatting all the time during the game.
NO TALK, NO BLAME, NO ARGUE please.

If you want to play with me, just add me and msg me. Thanks.

*Don't need to skype or whatever.
**Because I'm not a native english speaker :/

replies.body: Yo add me up, I was just Silver 5 last week, but trolls kept comin. I'm Asian btw maybe we could be duo buddies :D
Hey my Names NZL Fawn and i Flame blame my team every game and afk most of my games xd i only speak Maori So i think if we team up we can climb through the depths of ello hell :P

Main: Gold 1 (Plat V season 6)
Smurf: Silver 3

I dont mind playing with when I'm free!
Let me know what your IGN is and I'll add you on my smurf! :)
